browsermonkey.render
Class TextRenderNode

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              browsermonkey.render.RenderNode
                  browsermonkey.render.TextRenderNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class TextRenderNode
extends RenderNode

Renders formatted text with word wrap as a self-sizing RenderNode.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

HREF_ATTRIBUTE

public static final java.text.AttributedCharacterIterator.Attribute HREF_ATTRIBUTE
The TextAttribute (anonymous subclass) instance for storing the link href. Values for this attribute should be Strings.
